message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with the problem of understanding the message conveyed by images and their captions, which is a task related to computer vision (cs.CV) and natural language processing (cs.CL). The proposed methodology involves the use of large amounts of machine-readable knowledge, which is a common approach in information retrieval (cs.IR) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The algorithm combines different techniques such as entity linking, clustering, semantic relatedness, and learning-to-rank, which are also relevant to machine learning (cs.LG). Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.CV and cs.CL, followed by cs.IR, cs.AI, and cs.LG.
